This is probably a variety of English origin, although Hogg credits William Saunders, 
 London, Ontario, with having raised it. Plants at this Station are moderately vigorous, 
 nearly free from mildew; fruit of medium size, round, nearly smooth, dark red, quite 
 sweet; good.
